name: Mage Mayhem
description:
Choose from five unique classes, Fire Mage, Ice Mage, Tank, Healer, and Trapper, each with its own distinct playstyle and abilities. Pick 4 abilities from each class's selection, each containing at least 6 or more options to pick from! Further customize your character to suit your preferred combat style with 9 perks to be a ranger, a mini mage, and much more. Engage in up to 4v4 battles across multiple game modes and maps with your friends and prove you are the craziest mage of them all.

Fight against your friends


Or aid them


Pick from many different classes and abilities!


Choose a perk to make your playstyle more unique
